body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Willie Diaz and the customer's name is Kathleen Scott.  The conversation is about Dogs Playing Poker (a Art Gallery ) and is a conversation about typical situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Acme Support. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I have some issues with my account. Can you help me out?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! First, may I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. For verification purposes, could you please provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's January first, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also provide the last four digits of your Social Security Number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for the information, John. I'll go ahead and take a look at your account. Please hold for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: John, I have successfully verified your account and resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thanks for your help, Alex.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for calling Acme Support. Have a great day!
